page.title: 18SCHOOLS
page.content: Gawsworth School. Gawsworth school has 5 teachers and a headmaster.The headmaster is called Mr Downs, and the teachers are Mrs Morris, Mrs Pratt, Mrs Smith, Mr Jones and Mrs Burdekin.In the morning at 900am all the children go into the hall for assembly, and one of the staff or Mr Downs talks about somthing or we sing hymns. On Thursdays in assembly there is a radio programme, with a story on it and songs. After assembly everbody goes back into their classrooms, to start work. the first playtime that we have starts at 1035am and finishes at 1050am, then we go back into our classes again and start work. we have two computers in school and the classes take turns in using them. When dinner bell rings at 1155am and the people who have school dinners
